outputs.output_descr: The United Nations Development Assistance Framework (UNDAF) developed by the Government of South Africa and the UN for the period 2007-2010 has been lauded, by the Government of South Africa, as a positive example of developing an UNDAF through ownership and partnership, in keeping with the intentions of the Paris Declaration on Aid Effectiveness, 2005.  The Government and the UN Country team in South Africa have jointly discussed the possibility of documenting the UNDAF development process in South Africa with the idea of sharing knowledge and experiences on challenges and lessons learned with a broader group of development partners, national governments and other stakeholders.
